scripts.build_: tsc  &&  cp package.json dist/ &&  cp -r authentication dist/ && cp -r services_manager dist/ && cp -r applications_manager dist/ && cp -r blog dist/ && cp -r conversation dist/ && cp -r rbac dist/ && cp -r log dist/ && cp -r resource dist/ && cp -r repository dist/ && cp -r discovery dist/  && cp -r admin dist/ && cp -r spc dist/ && cp -r search dist/ && cp  -r catalog dist/ && cp -r echo dist/ && cp -r event dist/ && cp -r file dist/ && cp -r ldap dist/ && cp -r monitoring dist/ && cp -r persistence dist/ && cp -r mail dist/ && cp -r mail dist/ && cp -r sql dist/ && cp -r storage dist/
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
